Literature Review: Adjective ordering preferences have been a subject of interest in linguistics for decades, with researchers seeking to understand the underlying mechanisms that govern the relative order of adjectives across languages. This review aims to provide an overview of the current state of knowledge on this topic, highlighting the cross-linguistic regularities and proposing possible explanations for these preferences.
